```{r}
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
application_train <- read_csv("./application_train.csv")
head(application_train)
```

```{r}
perc_na <- colSums(is.na(application_train))/nrow(application_train)
round(perc_na * 100, 2) 
```

```{r}

application_train_zero <- colSums(application_train==0)/nrow(application_train)
round(application_train_zero * 100, 2)
```

```{r}
application_train <- application_train |> na.omit()
```
```{r}
nums <- application_train |> select(where(is.numeric))
```

```{r}
corr_cross(nums, # name of dataset
  max_pvalue = 0.05, # display only significant correlations (at 5% level)
  top = 40 # display top 10 couples of variables (by correlation coefficient)
)
```


```{r}
write.csv(cor(nums[,2: length(nums)])>0.9, file="Suspect_Correlations.csv")
write.csv(cor(nums[,2:length(nums)]), file="application_train_Correlation_Values.csv")
```
